title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user (owner) can successfully register with valid email and password, and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input a valid email address and strong password
Submit the registration form
Confirm registration success message is displayed
Verify user is created in the system and prompted to login

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Verify registration fails when an invalid email format is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input an invalid email format and valid password
Submit the registration form
Verify an error message about invalid email is displayed
Confirm registration is not completed

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that registered users can login successfully using valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input registered email and correct password
Click the login button
Verify that the user is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails when a registered user inputs an incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input registered email and incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify that login fails with an appropriate error message

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify that users can request password recovery and receive reset instructions.

steps.description: Navigate to the forgot password page
Input registered email address
Submit password recovery request
Verify the user receives a password reset email or notification

title: Profile Management - Update User Details
description: Verify that authenticated users can update their profile details successfully.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials
Navigate to profile management page
Update profile fields such as name and contact details
Save the changes
Verify profile updates are saved and displayed correctly

title: Add Business Profile via Onboarding Wizard
description: Verify new business owners can complete onboarding wizard to setup business profile including branding and operating hours.

steps.description: Login as a new business owner
Start onboarding wizard
Input business name, type (salon or barber), and branding preferences
Set operating hours and time zone
Complete onboarding and save configuration
Verify business profile is created with correct details
Verify onboarding wizard completes successfully without errors

title: Visual Theme Application and Switching
description: Verify custom themes (Barber brutalist dark and Beauty elegant neon) apply consistently and can be switched manually or automatically.

steps.description: Login and navigate to theme settings
Switch theme manually from Barber to Beauty
Verify UI updates reflect the selected theme styles across pages
Set theme to automatic switching based on business preference
Verify theme updates automatically according to configured preferences

title: Appointment Scheduling: Book Appointment via Public Link
description: Verify that clients can successfully book appointments using a public booking link without login, receiving confirmation via WhatsApp or email.

steps.description: Access the public booking link for an establishment
Select appointment date, time, and service
Enter client information (name, contact details)
Submit the booking request
Verify booking confirmation is displayed on screen
Verify client receives confirmation via WhatsApp or email

title: Appointment Scheduling: Internal Staff Agenda View
description: Verify that staff members can access their internal agenda showing accurate schedule and can mark services complete.

steps.description: Login as staff member
Navigate to internal agenda page
Verify schedule is displayed correctly with all appointments
Select an appointment and mark service as complete
Verify appointment status updates to completed

title: Appointment Scheduling: Automatic Time Blocking
description: Verify the system automatically blocks unavailable times preventing double-booking and overlapping appointments.

steps.description: Login as owner or staff
Create an appointment at a specific time slot
Attempt to create another appointment overlapping with the booked time
Verify the system blocks the time slot and prevents double-booking

title: Queue Management: Add and Manage Walk-in Clients
description: Verify staff members can add walk-in clients to the digital queue, update status, and manage client flow in real-time.

steps.description: Login as staff member
Navigate to queue management page
Add a new walk-in client to the queue
Verify client appears in the queue with correct details
Update client status (e.g. waiting, being served, completed)
Verify status updates reflect immediately in queue view

title: Financial Management: Record Sales Transaction
description: Verify that sales transactions can be recorded correctly and reflected in daily and monthly cash flow tracking.

steps.description: Login as business owner
Navigate to financial management page
Record a new sales transaction with amount, service, and date
Verify the transaction appears in daily cash flow
Verify monthly cash flow is updated accordingly

title: Financial Management: Professional Commission Calculations
description: Verify that the platform calculates professional commissions accurately based on predefined rules and transactions.

steps.description: Login as owner or finance manager
Access commissions management module
Define commission percentages for professionals
Record related sales transactions completed by professionals
Verify commissions are calculated correctly for each professional
Commission payment history reflects accurate payout data

title: Subscription Payments via Stripe Integration
description: Verify subscription payment flow through Stripe integration works reliably for business owners.

steps.description: Login as owner
Navigate to subscription payment page
Select subscription plan and proceed to payment
Verify Stripe payment form loads correctly
Complete a payment with valid card details
Verify payment is successful and subscription status updates

title: Dashboard KPIs and Financial Reports Accuracy
description: Verify executive dashboards show accurate KPIs such as revenue, average ticket size, occupancy rates and financial reports update in real-time.

steps.description: Login as owner
Navigate to dashboard and reports pages
Verify revenue, average ticket size, occupancy rate KPIs match underlying data
Verify reports generate correct financial insights and update in real-time

title: Multi-Tenant Data Access Isolation
description: Verify that data isolation is enforced correctly between multiple tenant establishments using row level security in Supabase.

steps.description: Login as user belonging to tenant A
Attempt to access data belonging to tenant B via UI or API
Verify access is denied and no data leakage occurs
Verify all data retrieved via queries is only within tenant scope

title: Administrative Route Protection
description: Verify routes requiring administrative privileges are properly protected and unauthorized access is prevented.

steps.description: Login as a non-admin user
Attempt to navigate to admin-only pages
Verify access is blocked with an unauthorized or redirect message
Login as admin user and access admin pages
Verify full access is granted

title: Responsive Design and Mobile UX
description: Verify UI elements adapt correctly to various screen sizes including mobile devices and maintain usability and aesthetics.

steps.description: Access the platform from desktop resolution
Verify UI elements render correctly and fully functional
Resize viewport to multiple mobile sizes (e.g. 375x667, 414x736)
Verify layout adapts to screen size without horizontal scroll or overlap
Verify interactive elements remain accessible and visually clear

title: Offline Usage Support as PWA
description: Verify that the platform supports offline usage with relevant UI states and data caching for a Progressive Web App experience.

steps.description: Access the application online and navigate through key pages
Simulate offline network condition
Verify cached pages load successfully with appropriate offline indicators
Attempt operations requiring network (e.g. booking new appointments)
Verify the system handles errors gracefully and informs the user

title: Team & Services: Add and Manage Professionals
description: Verify ability to add, edit, and remove team members and their services, including business operating hours configuration.

steps.description: Login as business owner
Navigate to team and services management module
Add a new professional with required details
Verify professional appears in team list
Assign services and configure working hours for the professional
Verify service and hours reflect correctly in schedules
Edit professional details and save changes
Verify updates are persisted
Delete a professional and confirm removal
Verify professional no longer appears in list and related data is cleaned up

title: Client CRM: Add and Manage Client Records
description: Verify users can add new clients to CRM, edit their information, and search/filter client database.

steps.description: Login as staff or owner
Navigate to clients CRM page
Add a new client with contact and profile details
Verify new client appears in client list
Edit existing client details and save changes
Verify updates are reflected in client database
Use search and filters to locate clients
Verify client list filters results correctly
